title: President of the European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: Mario Draghi was chosen to become the next President of the ECB on 24 June 2011. Draghi was president from 1 November 2011 until 31 October 2019 (succeeded by Christine Lagarde). title: European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: The executive board normally meets every Tuesday. It is composed of the President of the Bank (currently Christine Lagarde), the vice-president (currently Luis de Guindos) and four other members.
